column4: He glances nervously at Ms. SOMEONE.
He glances at his partner. The gang leader cuts off a sedan and rides up alongside them again.
He glances at his van.
He glances over his shoulder.
He glances around the office then screws up his piece of paper into a ball. 8 jumps to 154.
But she doesn't even glance in his direction.
He glances down at her with a pensive smile.
He steps to the curb, then glances at the crosswalk sign, which shows a red hand.
SOMEONE flinches, then glances at SOMEONE.
SOMEONE points at his own throat then shakes his head. He glances over his shoulder, clasps his hands, and then taps his own chest.
He glances at the stranger then picks up his weapon and stumbles off.
As he answers her, she glances over her shoulder.
They glance skyward.
SOMEONE chuckles and shakes his head. He glances at SOMEONE.
As the boy clings to him, he glances uncomfortably at the brunette. SOMEONE wanders pass them, holding his helmet.
He glances at SOMEONE, who sits nearby with a somber gaze. SOMEONE kneels in front of the boy.
She glances at the letter then takes it and nods.
He glances at SOMEONE and blocks it below.
He glances around, then leans in close.
On their way upstairs, he glances back at SOMEONE<Malcolm> who sneers and points. Now, in a dorm,
She glances up from her schoolwork and winces.
